thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 21 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Seritage Growth, First Washington Partner To Own Corbin Collection In Connecticut

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Seritage Growth, First Washington Partner To Own Corbin Collection In Connecticut

organizations.name: first washington partner to own corbin collection in connecticut

text:
May 21 (Reuters) - Seritage Growth Properties:
* SERITAGE GROWTH PROPERTIES AND FIRST WASHINGTON REALTY ANNOUNCE PARTNERSHIP TO OWN THE CORBIN COLLECTION IN WEST HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT
* SERITAGE GROWTH PROPERTIES - TRANSACTION VALUES CORBIN COLLECTION AT APPROXIMATELY $52 MILLION, INCLUDING COSTS REMAINING TO COMPLETE PROJECT
* SERITAGE GROWTH PROPERTIES - SOLD 50% INTEREST IN PROJECT TO AFFILIATE OF FIRST WASHINGTON REALTY; RECEIVED PROCEEDS OF ABOUT $23 MILLION AT DEAL CLOSING
* SERITAGE GROWTH PROPERTIES - PARTNERSHIP SIMULTANEOUSLY CLOSED ON A $20 MILLION LOAN WITH M&T BANK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
